transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Ya, mai Arrow flow industries se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Konsi industry sir?
Executive: Arrow flow industries.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: IndiaMART se registered hai TrustSeal se TrustSeal hua hai. Mere mere na mail me issue aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Aap mujhe spell out kar payenge I am sorry registered number aap bata de aap mujhe jisse mai aapki profile open kar saku. Actually kya hai system ji ji sir.
Executive: Ha ha mai bata raha hu 9758
Customer: Yes.
Executive: 22
Customer: 22
Executive: 9758
Customer: 9758 Arrow flow industries.
Executive: Correct.
Customer: Ya.
Executive: Aur sir is time batayenge ki profile ko kaun dekh raha hai?
Customer: Ab mai hi dekh raha hu sir isliye call mere pass redirect land hua hai. Maine number isliye pucha agar jaise aapne 9696 pe call kiya is samay correct.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Aapka jo call aaya hai mere pass wo 9696 se kiya tha aapne right sir?
Customer: 26 haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji 9696 se aaya sir. Haan waha se redirect hoke call hamare pass mere pass bhi aaya hai ki mai ye aapka call manage karu Abhishek Soni. Aap mera naam bhi check kar sakte ho apni profile par aapko issue kya aa raha hai mujhe bataye fir mai usme help karu aapki. Ye ye sir ye Raja Maurya kaun hai sir ye?
Customer: Raja?
Customer: Raja Maurya.
Customer: Raja sorry wo must be saying Raju Maurya.
Customer: Raju Maurya right.
Customer: Ya.
Executive: Ya.
Executive: Is one of my colleagues.
Customer: Apne staff me hai kya ye Raju Maurya?
Customer: Ha abhi to nahi hai kya issue hai sir bataye mujhe?
Customer: Ye mere ko continue call kar rahe hain is baat me.
Customer: Okay continue call karna actually kya hai us samay mai available nahi hu to unhone jo mere manager hai unhone unko bol diya hoga sabko call kar lo koi issue na ho.
Customer: Staff me hai na kabhi aisa nahi staff me hai kabhi aisa hoke bahar ke bande hai ke wo mere ko call kar rahe hain.
Executive: Absolutely staff me hi hai Raju Maurya hai. Mai unhe personally janta hu. Mujhe information thi ki unko bola gaya hai mere data se yaani aapko call karne ke liye. Lekin itna kar diya hai isliye to mai sorry mafi chahunga.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Accha actually main ho sakta hai isliye connect kar rahe ho ki aapka ek ticket bhi open ho gaya hai.
Customer: Aap unhone unhone jo baat hai time diya tha mere ko aur wo Monday ke liye bola to unhone to likha bhi good morning are you free today matlab aap free hai to mai kar sakta hu baat to please meri mai aapko whatsapp kar sakta hu agar problem ye aa rahi hai ki koi mail nahi aa rahi aur buyer track nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Exactly isliye connect karne ki koshish kari mail isliye nahi aa rahi hai. Kyunki uska concern mere pass bhi open hai mai aapko call aaj jarur karta mai khud karta kyunki concern jab lete sir uska top issue bada hone se pehle aapko connect karna jaruri hai. Email ka issue hai aapke me ticket bhi mere pass open hai jisko close karna jaruri hai kya karna hoga aapko mai guide kar deta hu. Aur rahi sir aapki jo email hai airflowindustries@gmail.com hai right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay to isme sir kya hai aapka jo storage hota hai na mail gmail pe milta hai 15 gb ka to matlab email wo full ho chuka hai. Ya to aap apne jo inbox hai usko completely clear kar de. Halaki isse isse jyada effect nahi padta effect padta hai other data se jo ki mainly hota hai aapka images mail mail pe aapki images stored hoti hai backup ke through.
Customer: Agar
Customer: Air bits lana udhar se.
Executive: Dekhiye sir mai inbox ko apne mail inbox ko clear kar deta hu to sir wo part ka wo to problem ho jayegi na sir mere liye.
Customer: Nahi nahi ek kaam karo check karne ke liye kis cheez se sabse jyada aapka storage bada hai wo mai guide kar deta hu to aapko pata chalega kya delete karne se connection ho jayega. Kyunki mail me koi limit nahi hoti sir main hota hai storage ka mail pe aapka drive google matlab jitne bhi aapke applications hote hain google ke haan haan un sabhi ka storage hota hai aur mainly jo aapka storage hota hai photos se aata hai backup hoke. Hai na? Aur mail pe jyadatar thoda bahut document hote hain jiska size mere khayal se jyada se jyada ho jayega 1 gb ho jayega 2 gb ho jayega mail par lekin 15 gb aapka storage hota hai mainly photos pe hota hai ek bar check kar lo kya aapki jo matlab aap agar photos open karte ho usme manage google account mai photo delete kar sakta hu mujhe bataye jara kaise honge kahan se honge storage se mat kijiyega storage se delete mat kijiyega ye delete hongi aapki jo photos hai photos hai na google ka haan haan usko open kijiye first of all to usme backup jo on hai usko backup off kar dijiye. Yaha pe sir unlock discount likha hua hai. Unlock discount isliye aa raha hai kyunki manage storage likha hua hai. Manage storage pe click kijiye. Thik hai kar diya sir yaha par full aa raha hai sir isko full aa raha hai to usme ek graph style ka aa raha hoga jaise red yellow blue to usme aap dekhiye red aa raha hai red use details red aa raha hai sir. Sabse jyada kis cheez se bhara hua hai storage aapka? Usko click karna padega fir dekhna padega mere ko. Ek dekhiye ek bar. Kyunki ye mai janta hu ki total google photo se bhara hua hai sir wo to. Photos to ab aap aapke pass itni jankari matlab itna to aapko pata hi hoga kaun si image aapki matlab kaam ki nahi hai. Haan haan documented uske hisab se aap usko delete kar dalo. Thik hai backup me se backup me karna uske baad trash pe ja ke trash pe kar dena. Jo aapki kahan se sir aap aise please mujhe guide kar de aise hi. Sure sir accha aap comfortable ho to mai video meet pe connect karke aapko karwa du? Haan haan kar sakte hain bilkul koi problem nahi hai. To mai ek video link bhej raha hu just aapki wahi registered mail id okay registered mail id me mai create to kar raha hu mail to koi nahi raha na sir whatsapp se ho jayega whatsapp pe kara dijiye. Mail se nahi hoga koi baat nahi yahi issue hai kyunki ye pehle bhi shayad aapka ek aad bar hua hai. Nahi nahi first time hua hai sir jyada problem ho rahi hai ab. Koi dikkat nahi sir mai isko clear kar deta hu don't worry. I am sorry ki aap ek bar number aapna dobara bol sakte ho sir? Whatsapp wala? Haan 975 haan 9758 ya 9758 229758 229758 haan ji sir. Okay maine aapko hi message kiya hai abhi dekhiye aaya mera message? Hmm hmm hmm okay aa gaya isse aap reply hi reply kar dijiye tab aapki link open ho payegi.

Ya dekhiye sir abhi maine link aapko de di hai video meet ki link hai google meet ki ek minute bas bilkul bilkul.

Jain sir dekhne mil gaya aapko aapko?

Ya.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai lekin clear nahi aa rahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing email issues.

- Wants to know who Raja Maurya is.

- Buyer is not getting tracked.

- Storage is full.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed Raja Maurya is a colleague.

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive explained the email storage issue.

- Executive offered to guide via video call.

- Executive sent a WhatsApp link for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will assist customer via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email issue, storage, google photos, video call, whatsapp
